comments:
From: Jon Skeet <skeet@pobox.com>
Newsgroups: eclipse.tools
Subject: Bug report - org.eclipse.jface.util.Assert$AssertionFailedException: 
assertion failed;
Date: Tue, 23 Oct 2001 16:19:02 +0100

Not sure if this has already been posted, I'm afraid, but it can't hurt. 
Just tried to quit Eclipse, which asked me if I wanted to save a file. I 
said yes:

================
Karice McIntyre <karice_mcintyre@oti.com> wrote:
> What version (build) of eclipse are you using?  

R1.0 (0.137) - sorry for not saying so before :(

================

Simon Arsenault <simon_arsenault@stop.oti.com> wrote:
> Can you always reproduce this problem?
> 
> Can you provide us with instructions on how to setup Eclipse so this
> error will occur?

Unfortunately not. I've tried leaving errors in an unsaved file in the 
hope that compilation failure would kill things, and making the file 
read-only... neither of these provoke the failure, I'm afraid.

If I run into it again, I'll post again - sorry I can't be more helpful 
:(
We should try to reproduce this again and if not, just close it.
